segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center-left, where a boy is trying to reach something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool's legs are splayed, almost tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart skips a beat just looking at how unstable it appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet, his whole body stretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" inside, filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, and he's holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could tumble down at any moment, along with the cookies and the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice before he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risk of him falling seems quite high from where I'm observing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a tense moment, watching him teeter so close to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
